name: Fireflies
description:
Fireflies is a game about surviving inside a spider-infested yard, while being tiny and trying to reverse the magic spell that was done to you so you can return back to normal size and save your family.

Helen and her family , were lost in the woods and found refuge in an old secluded house that belong to an evil witch. The witch , tricked Helen and her family to drink a magical potion that made everyone really small so she can later turn them into voodoo dolls that she can use for her magic. Helen realized something was wrong and she quickly fled the house while the potion was still taking effect on her. The evil witch being too small and too weak to chase Helen , she send her loyal followers , the spiders, to chase Helen and bring them back to her. Helen was caught by a spider but with the help of some mystical fireflies she managed to escape. The fireflies now are helping Helen so she can rescue her family, return them back to their non-voodoo doll self and also return her back to her normal size.

Follow the storyline of Helen while she struggles to save her family and then return to her normal size.
See the plot and how and why these magical fireflies are aiding her.
Be chased by various spiders and try to solve the puzzles to proceed to the next part of the yard , basement, well and forest!

Current Features
Survivor type acrobatics with Helen :
Crawling , Jumping , Ledge Grabbing , Rolling , Wall Running and Climbing
Cutscenes being chased or eaten by spiders (No Gore showed besides occational blood splatters inside locations)
Creative ways to reach a location
Exploring
Physics based puzzle solving
Atmospheric music track
Automatic CheckPoint saving

Just a small team at the moment, but I am very committed to providing the following planned Features:

Steam Achievements support
Adding Basement/Well and further expanding the forest so it can be explored.
Further expanding the dialog/voices and adding more plot and lore
Adding secret rooms
Adding Skins for Helen and even some spiders
